import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, ChevronRight, Star, Heart, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import '../App.css'; const ShopPage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('All Categories'); const [selectedPort, setSelectedPort] = useState('All Ports'); const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState('featured'); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Mock data for products const products = [ { id: 1, title: 'Premium Electronics Components', seller: 'VEND-23-ABC123', port: 'Mumbai Port', category: 'Electronics', description: 'High-quality electronic components for industrial use with 5-year warranty', price: '$5,000', likes: 1240, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.8, verified: true }, { id: 2, title: 'Organic Cotton Textiles', seller: 'VEND-23-XYZ789', port: 'Chennai Port', category: 'Textiles', description: 'Sustainable organic cotton fabrics for fashion industry, GOTS certified', price: '$3,500', likes: 890, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.9, verified: true }, { id: 3, title: 'Industrial Machinery Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-DEF456', port: 'JNPT', category: 'Machinery', description: 'Heavy-duty machinery components for manufacturing with ISO 9001 certification', price: '$12,000', likes: 670, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.7, verified: false }, { id: 4, title: 'Specialty Chemicals', seller: 'VEND-23-GHI321', port: 'Vishakhapatnam Port', category: 'Chemicals', description: 'High-purity chemicals for pharmaceutical industry, REACH compliant', price: '$8,500', likes: 420, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.6, verified: true }, { id: 5, title: 'Automotive Spare Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-JKL987', port: 'Kolkata Port', category: 'Automotive', description: 'OEM quality automotive components with 2-year guarantee', price: '$6,200', likes: 750, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.5, verified: true }, { id: 6, title: 'Construction Materials', seller: 'VEND-23-MNO654', port: 'Mumbai Port', category: 'Construction', description: 'High-grade construction materials with ISI certification', price: '$4,800', likes: 530, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.4, verified: false }, { id: 7, title: 'Medical Devices', seller: 'VEND-23-PQR321', port: 'Chennai Port', category: 'Healthcare', description: 'FDA-approved medical equipment for hospitals and clinics', price: '$15,000', likes: 320, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.9, verified: true }, { id: 8, title: 'Agricultural Equipment', seller: 'VEND-23-STU654', port: 'JNPT', category: 'Agriculture', description: 'Modern farming machinery for efficient crop production', price: '$9,500', likes: 410, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.3, verified: true }, { id: 9, title: 'Renewable Energy Solutions', seller: 'VEND-23-VWX987', port: 'Kolkata Port', category: 'Energy', description: 'Solar panels and wind turbines for sustainable energy generation', price: '$22,000', likes: 680, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.8, verified: true }, { id: 10, title: 'Packaging Materials', seller: 'VEND-23-YZ1234', port: 'Vishakhapatnam Port', category: 'Packaging', description: 'Eco-friendly packaging solutions for various industries', price: '$2,300', likes: 290, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.2, verified: false }, { id: 11, title: 'Marine Equipment', seller: 'VEND-23-AB5678', port: 'Mumbai Port', category: 'Marine', description: 'Navigation and safety equipment for commercial vessels', price: '$7,800', likes: 370, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.6, verified: true }, { id: 12, title: 'Food Processing Machinery', seller: 'VEND-23-CD9012', port: 'Chennai Port', category: 'Food & Beverages', description: 'Automated machinery for food production and packaging', price: '$18,500', likes: 520, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.7, verified: true } ]; const categories = ['All Categories', 'Electronics', 'Machinery', 'Textiles', 'Chemicals', 'Automotive', 'Construction', 'Healthcare', 'Agriculture', 'Energy', 'Packaging', 'Marine', 'Food & Beverages']; const ports = ['All Ports', 'Mumbai Port', 'Chennai Port', 'JNPT', 'Kolkata Port', 'Vishakhapatnam Port']; // Filter products based on search, category, and port const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => { const matchesSearch = product.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'All Categories' || product.category === selectedCategory; const matchesPort = selectedPort === 'All Ports' || product.port === selectedPort; return matchesSearch && matchesCategory && matchesPort; }); // Pagination const productsPerPage = 8; const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredProducts.length / productsPerPage); const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * productsPerPage; const currentProducts = filteredProducts.slice(startIndex, startIndex + productsPerPage); const handleRFQ = (productId) => { // In a real app, this would check if user is logged in // For now, we'll redirect to login navigate('/login'); }; return (
